title: What are some good online degree courses in philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Logic is the investigation of general and principal issues concerning matters, for example, presence, information, values, reason, mind, and language.[5][6] The term was most likely begat by Pythagoras. Philosophical techniques incorporate addressing, basic dialog, judicious contention and methodical presentation. Some of the online courses are Bachelor of Arts degree in Philosophy. The BA in Philosophy consists of twelve courses. Diploma of Higher Education in Philosophy. The Dip HE in Philosophy consists of eight courses. Certificate of Higher Education in Philosophy

Higher Learning Online lists online degree programs from respected universities and colleges ranked by US News. They do have a few online bachelor degrees in Philosophy: Online Philosophy Degree Programs - Higher Learning Online.
